TopicTitle: New stock aero vs FAR vs NEAR

Articles.Content:
I'm not an aerospace engineer so I really don't know how much more accurate FAR and NEAR compared to the new stock aero.

Could anyone tell me if NEAR is still relevant with the new stock? I assume FAR still represents a more realistic and harsh model but from some threads about reentry problems with the new stock aero (speaking about issues I never had with FAR) I could be wrong...

I would love if some of the more informed or accademic players could share some insights as this question can't be answered with "just try them and chose which you like best". I would like to know which is the more realistic model and how much different it is as I can't judge that for myself.

Bonus points if you could rate them in comparisson (for example: stock is 5, NEAR is 7 and FAR is 9).
Talking about NEAR is irrelevant since it ferram4 will not update it for 1.0
